amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Energy to employ in excess 95 percent of the Department's total number of employees as of the date of the enactment of this act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Energy to employ in excess 95 percent of the Department's total number of employees as of the date of the enactment of this act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A040) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A040) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Yoho.
